testcase.name: User submits the contact us form successfully
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the user navigates to the About Us page................................passed And the user scrolls down and selects the Hotel, Office, and Healthcare tabs.passed And the user navigates to the Our Services page.............................passed And the user navigates to the Contact Us page...............................passed And the user fills out the contact form.....................................passed And the user submits the contact form.......................................passed Then the user should see a confirmation message.............................passed
